name: Popcorn Veggie Pakoras
preparation: In a large bowl, combine mix with hot water and lemon juice. Let stand 5 min.
Meanwhile, chop and measure cauliflower and broccoli; place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 2 min.
Fold steamed veggies into pakora batter along with frozen peas and lentils.

Preheat frying pan over medium heat; add half the oil. Using half the batter, drop by tablespoon into the pan; flatten slightly. Cook until golden on both sides, about 5â€“7 min. Repeat with remaining oil and batter.
tips: Serve with tartar sauce by combining 1⁄4 cup plain Greek yogurt with 1⁄2 cup mayo, 2 tbsp green relish, 2 tsp Lemon Dilly Dip Mix and 1-2 tsp lemon juice.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄4 cup tzatziki and 1⁄2 cup fries.
